channel.title: Homes on Amir Djalovski
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Amir Djalovski

item.title: Press and conf
item.description: The new york time and science daily wrote about my article “Maternal depression alters stress and immune biomarkers in mother and child”. I was the chair of the session “Synchrony and Emotional Contagion” during the conffresnce on “Developmental Social Neuroscience: A Field In The Making” at the Interdisciplinary Center Herzliya, Israel. My article “Maternal depression alters stress and immune biomarkers in mother and child” The New York Times and Science Daily on my contribution to the .
